title: [AUTOFIX][ISSUE-1858][CANDIDATE-2] Fix path traversal vulnerability in TodoStorage
summary: Add path validation to reject '..' components and prevent directory traversal attacks
approach: Add _validate_path() method in TodoStorage.__init__() that checks for '../' and '..\' patterns and raises ValueError if found. Also warns if absolute paths escape CWD.
risks: Paths with '..' at start, end, or middle are now rejected - this is intentional for security
Absolute paths outside CWD generate warnings but still work (for legitimate use cases)
